      • reload

        public void reload​(Weapon toLoad,
                   java.util.List<Powerup> discountPowerups)
            throws NoItemInInventoryException,
                   InsufficientResourcesException
        Parameters:
        toLoad - Weapon to reload
        discountPowerups - Powerups to use as discount on reload price
        Throws:
        NoItemInInventoryException - if toLoad is not in player's inventory
        InsufficientResourcesException - if there are insufficient resources in player's inventory

      • getCellAtDistance

        public java.util.List<Cell> getCellAtDistance​(int minDist,
                                              int maxDist)
        Parameters:
        minDist - Minimum distance
        maxDist - Maximum distance. -1 is equal to INFINITE
        Returns:
        List of all cells between [minDist] and [maxDist] distance from player
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if minDist less than 0 or maxDist less than -1

      • getVisibleCellsAtDistance

        public java.util.List<Cell> getVisibleCellsAtDistance​(int minDist,
                                                      int maxDist)
        Parameters:
        minDist - Minimum distance
        maxDist - Maximum distance. -1 is equal to INFINITE
        Returns:
        List of all visible cells from this player between distance minDist and maxDist

      • getOutOfSightCells

        public java.util.List<Cell> getOutOfSightCells​(int minDist,
                                               int maxDist)
        Parameters:
        minDist - Minimum distance
        maxDist - Maximum distance. -1 is equal to INFINITE
        Returns:
        List of all non-visible cells from this player between distance minDist and maxDist

      • pickWeapon

        public void pickWeapon​(Weapon toPick,
                       java.util.List<Powerup> discountPowerups)
                throws InventoryFullException,
                       InsufficientResourcesException,
                       NoItemInInventoryException
        Add [toPick] weapon, if there are less then 3 weapons in player's inventory and if [toPick] is not in inventory.

        Throws:
        InventoryFullException - if player has already 3 weapons

      • canPay

        public boolean canPay​(java.util.List<Resource> toPay,
                      java.util.List<Powerup> powerupsAsResource)
        Check if player can pay the whole toPay cost with given powerups as discount
        Parameters:
        toPay - List of resources to pay.
        powerupsAsResource - list of powerups used as discount
        Returns:
        True if, using given powerups as resources, player can handle toPay cost
